A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible movie all-around. The characters are bland and uninteresting\, though calling them characters is a stretch. Luke Skywalker\, a beloved character\, has been utterly butchered to the point of being unrecognizable. I left the cinema disappointed\, and with two questions. What on earth was Ryan Johnson smoking when he made this trash heap of a movie\, and where can I get some? Literal garbage\, I'd give 0/5 if I could.
